member.name: M:PayPal.Util.QueryParameters.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

members.member:
Set the start index
@param startIndex Start index of the resources to be returned. Typically used to jump to a specific position in the resource history based on its order.

Set the starttime
@param starttime Resource creation time that indicates the start of a range of results.

Set the endtime
@param endTime Resource creation time that indicates the end of a range of results.

member.name: M:PayPal.Util.QueryParameters.SetSortBy(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the sort by based on create_time or update_time.

members.member:
Set the sort order
@param sortOrder Sort based on order of results. Options include asc for ascending order or dec for descending order.

member.summary: This object is used for the shipping address.

member.name: T:PayPal.Api.Payments.Address
member.summary: The Base Address object used as shipping or billing address in a payment.

member.summary: Converts the object to JSON string
member.returns: the object as a JSON string

member.name: P:PayPal.Api.Payments.Address.line1
member.summary: The Line 1 of the address (e.g., Number, street, etc). 100 characters max. Required.
member.value: The first line of an address, as string.

member.name: P:PayPal.Api.Payments.Address.line2
member.summary: The Line 2 of the address (e.g., Suite, apt #, etc). 100 characters max. Optional
member.value: The second line of an address, as string

member.name: P:PayPal.Api.Payments.Address.city
member.summary: The city name. 50 characters max. Required.
member.value: The city name, as string.

member.name: P:PayPal.Api.Payments.Address.state
member.summary: The 2 letter code for US states, and the equivalent for other countries. 100 characters max. Required.
member.value: The 2 letter code for US states, as string.

member.name: P:PayPal.Api.Payments.Address.postal_code
member.summary: The Zip code or equivalent is usually required for countries that have them. 20 characters max. Required in certain countries.
member.value: The Zip code or equivalent, as string.

member.name: P:PayPal.Api.Payments.Address.country_code
member.summary: The 2 letter country code. 2 characters max. Required
member.value: The 2 letter country code, as string.

member.name: P:PayPal.Api.Payments.Address.type
member.summary: Address type; allowable values are residential, business, or mailbox. Optional
member.value: The Address type, as string.

member.name: P:PayPal.Api.Payments.Address.phone
member.summary: The phone number in e.123 format. Optional.
member.value: The phone number, as string.

member.returns: the object as a JSON string

member.value: The name of the recipient at this address, as string.

member.value: The Credit card type, as string.

member.name: P:PayPal.Api.Payments.CreditCard.number
member.summary: The Credit card number. Numeric characters only with no spaces or punctuation. The string must conform with modulo and length required by each credit card type. Redacted in responses. Required.
member.value: The Credit card number, as string.

member.value: The 4-digit expiration year, as string.

member.summary: Use this call to refund a completed payment. Provide the sale_id in the URI and an empty JSON payload for a full refund. For partial refunds, you can include an amount.
